projects.title: MockMyAPIs
projects.description: A free web-based tool for developers to quickly create mock API endpoints. Supports OpenAPI specification upload and manual endpoint definition - no installation required.

projects.title: QuickTools
projects.description: A collection of 22+ free browser-based utilities for developers. Includes JSON formatter, Base64 encoder, JWT decoder, UUID generator, hash generator, and more - all running locally for 100% privacy.

projects.title: WSO2 APK Memory Optimization
projects.description: Leading initiative to minimize APK memory consumption by rewriting Java-based enforcer in Go and leveraging Envoy filters for key functionalities.

projects.title: EnvoyGateway Integration
projects.description: Led evaluation and implementation of EnvoyGateway within APK system. Conducted POC and successfully advocated for integration into major release.

projects.title: Cilium Gateway PoC
projects.description: Developed proof-of-concept demonstrating Cilium Gateway for both service mesh and API management functionalities.

projects.title: Performance Optimization - 666% Improvement
projects.description: Improved WSO2 API Manager performance from 150 to 1000 APIs by identifying and fixing bottlenecks through load testing and code optimization.

projects.title: AI API Rate Limiting & Analytics
projects.description: Designed and implemented subscription-based and backend-based token rate limiting for AI APIs, along with analytics for AI API requests.

projects.title: Salesforce Bulk API v2.0 Connector
projects.description: Designed and implemented WSO2 connector for Salesforce Bulk API v2.0, enabling efficient batch data operations.

projects.title: APIM Testing Automation
projects.description: Designed Jenkins job for automating APIM profile testing in AWS EKS, eliminating manual testing in patching process.

projects.title: Klarna & 3DS Payment Integration
projects.description: Implemented Klarna pay-by-link and 3DS functionality for Enactor Payments, achieving accreditation with major card networks.

projects.title: CPAchecker IntelliJ Plugin
projects.description: Google Summer of Code project - Developed IntelliJ IDE plugin for CPAchecker software verification tool with CI/CD pipeline.

projects.title: AWS Resource Management System
projects.description: Built internal system to track and manage Sysco LABS AWS resources, improving infrastructure visibility and cost management.
